pages.text: $(li)Phantoms are flying undead hostile creatures that spawn when you have not slept or died for three or more days.$(br)$(li)They will be flying around you and lashing out at you.$(br)$(li)You can transform this creature into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/flare)Flare$(/l) throwing it a $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/insomnia)Potion of Insomnia$(/l).
They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/phantom_membrane)Phantom Membrane$(/l) upon death.
